name: Upnea
description:
This is our submission to the Global Startupcities Game Jam with the topic "win-win situation".

The game tells the story of a lonely diver who has to team up with a lantern-fish to be able to exit a deep cave in the ocean. The game presents multiple puzzles that will test the player's coordination and analysis skills.

Developed by Sleepy Racoon team!

Marina Prats: https://marinaprats2020.itch.io/

Carlos Parrado: https://parrakimichi.itch.io/

Isabel Álvarez: https://sisaarts.itch.io/

Miguel Rodríguez: https://migrv.itch.io/

Miguel Lentisco: https://miguellentisco.itch.io/

And myself :)
